mapper.insert: insert into comment (user_id, study_id, comment_detail, regist_time, up_comment_id) value (#{userId}, #{studyId},#{commentDetail}, now(), #{upCommentId});
mapper.update: update comment set comment_detail = #{commentDetail}, modify_time = now() where user_id = #{userId} and comment_id = #{commentId}
